Basil: I'm the most aromatic one here!
Leaf me alone, I'm basil-ing in the glow!
Call me king of the herbs!
Lettuce: Leaf by leaf, I grow stronger!
Romaine calm and carry on growing!
I eat to live and live to be eaten!
I like to be tucked in at night and sleep on a coco coir pillow..
Arabalika and I played with our blocks the other day..
Ararararajoona's name is hard. I say too many Arararas..
Mint: I'm minting new leaves every day!
I'm cooler than all the other plants!
Strawberry: Sweet dreams are made of berries!
Tomato: I'm the fruit that everyone thinks is a vegetable!
Pepper: Life is better with a little spice!
Cilantro: Either you love me or you hate me!
Arugula: Europeans call me 'rocket' for a reason!
Adding a bite to your salad life!
Thyme: Having the thyme of my life!
It's always a good thyme to grow!
Rosemary: I'm a memory booster with attitude!
Chives: Onion's cute cousin reporting for duty!
I'll make your baked potato happy!
Unknown Plant: Who am I? It's a mystery!
Call me whatever you want, I'll still grow!
My name is a mystery, but my growth is history!
